decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: 1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6A; 7A; Heritage Statement; Reasonable Exception Statement.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building and shall be retained thereafter. 
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The rooflights hereby approved shall be conservation style roof lights (i.e: flush with the existing roofline), and shall be retained as such thereafter.
REASON: To conserve and preserve the Pinner Hill Estate Conservation Area in accordance with The National Planning Policy Framework (2021), policies D3 and HC1 of The London Plan (2021), policies DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the Pinner Hill Conservation Area Appraisal and Management Strategy.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding Condition 3, clay tiles to match the existing roof tiles must be used for the false pitched roof and shall be retained thereafter. 
REASON: To conserve and preserve the Pinner Hill Estate Conservation Area in accordance with The National Planning Policy Framework (2021), policies D3 and HC1 of The London Plan (2021), policies DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the Pinner Hill Conservation Area Appraisal and Management Strategy.
description: Alterations to roof; two rear dormers; rooflight in rear roofslope; sunpipe in both side roofslopes; single storey rear infill extension; external alterations
